summary: This mod simply reverses the vanilla conjuration-sound and lowers its volume, too.
descriptionHtml:
I thought it\'d be nice not to sh*t my pants every time i conjured whatever thingy. I am most certain others had a similar idea already, however, this is my version of it. If there are others having a patent pending, go ahead and sue me for not using google properly :-P

I edited the File \\sound\\fx\\mag\\conjure\\mag_conjure_fire.wav, reversed the file, and lowered the volume. From what i can hear ingame it blends in pretty well, but i must admit that i have not yet tested it during harsh battles. I guess it should work fine though. 

For installing this mod simply download it with NMM and hit activate/deactivate

Alternatively just plant the file mag_conjure_fire.wav into the data\\sound\\fx\\mag\\conjure folder or remove it in case you want to deinstall.
author: zemule
